sledgehammer.npc.behavior

Class BehaviorSurvive

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.npc.behavior.Behavior
        • sledgehammer.npc.behavior.BehaviorSurvive

  • public class BehaviorSurvive
extends Behavior
    Behavior to handle a NPC to survive in the game-world by finding weapons and killing zombies.
    Author:
    Jab
